Journal Story: I have been preparing my body for a hike of more than 329 miles, according to the online hike calculator.  My pack weight is in flux and being further shaken down.  smiles for miles-yes

I just printed a copy of dry & liquid measure conversions at the VA [as in veteran] library.  That is probably the last time that I will use VA in that context unless I mention a hospital.  Returning home to pack food for 20 days....
Last night, I scheduled a shuttle from train to gap :)...today my shady hat is mended :)...packing food...one step closer...:)
Packing food and shaking down the pack further, at home; thanks to pre-hike trail angels Tom, Stanimal, and Aaron for help:). That is me, in the pic...thanks for taking the pic Aaron:)
